title: Recreating Logo
content:
Hi. I want to re-create this and do not have an original good file. Any ideas in terms of the font that would have been used? Thank you :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Predator.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020123944/http:/typophile.com/files/Predator.JPG) | 21.09 KB |
author: Sianita

comments.content: even with the distortion, I would guess this is not a font. comparing the two Rs shows they do not share common points.
